title: Total population of Russia 2024
summary: Overall Inhabitants in millions has increased over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Inhabitants in millions, of value 146.9 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Inhabitants in millions about 146.5 was reached at Year 2015
min_summary: In general Inhabitants in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020.
